articles.author: Winnie Hsu
articles.title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P Live Updates for October 18 - Bloomberg
articles.description: Asian stocks fluctuated as traders weighed better-than-expected China data against intensifying Middle East tensions. The Bank of Japan announced unscheduled bond purchases to stem a rise in yields.
articles.content: Asian stocks fluctuated as traders weighed better-than-expected China data against intensifying Middle East tensions. The Bank of Japan announced unscheduled bond purchases to stem a rise in yields. … [+289 chars]
